--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> Megatron nodded his head in agreement.
> "Yes, an new ally to help us fight against the Predacons once we 
dispose of Unicron," he said.
> The Emperor clone's sensors reported, that in a few hours the 
interferance would dissolve.
> "In a few decacycles that interferance will disappear.  Shall we 
try then?"
